=GWT Class API=

The Google Web Toolkit includes a class library designed to help you [http://google-web-toolkit-doc-1-5.googlecode.com/svn/javadoc/1.5/com/google/gwt/user/client/ui/package-summary.html build your user interface], [http://google-web-toolkit-doc-1-5.googlecode.com/svn/javadoc/1.5/com/google/gwt/user/client/rpc/package-summary.html make RPC calls to your server], [http://google-web-toolkit-doc-1-5.googlecode.com/svn/javadoc/1.5/com/google/gwt/i18n/client/package-summary.html internationalize your application], [http://google-web-toolkit-doc-1-5.googlecode.com/svn/javadoc/1.5/com/google/gwt/junit/client/package-summary.html perform unit testing], and lots more!
